ETYMOLOGY: From combining form 'bio-' (from Ancient Greek βίος (bíos, “life”)) + 'chemistry'.

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: A word (other than a pronoun) used to identify any of a class of people, places, or things, or to name a particular one of these.
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: The study of the chemical processes within and relating to living organisms, as well as the chemical structures and functions of the components of living matter.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 研究生物体内部及其相关化学过程的科学，以及生命物质组成部分的化学结构和功能。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: She decided to major in biochemistry because of her interest in how living things function at a molecular level.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 由于她对生物在分子层面如何运作感兴趣，她决定主修生物化学。
